Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
AI is reshaping roles, skills, and organizational structures. In this session, see how new agents, connectors and Microsoft 365 Copilot capabilities bring people and organizational insights together to help teams plan and adapt for AI-driven workforce transformation. See demos and learn how Microsoft is using these capabilities to connect teams, accelerate learning and increase agility in workforce planning.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
